data.title: Terrific Spot to Catch Food, Games, and Drinks!
data.text: Mac’s is a great place to relax and hang out with locals to catch games and to just hang out.  Great weekday food specials and the food is excellent!  Always a good place to unwind after a long day.

data.title: Great evening specials
data.text: Mac's offers very good pub fare at affordable prices.  Have visited Mac's several times over the last several months and you can't go wrong with their food.  Whether its burger baskets on Monday, Taco Tuesday or Wings Wednesday, I've never been disappointed.

data.title: Great food and atmosphere
data.text: We ate dinner at Mac's Tavern on St. Patrick's Day and enjoyed Corned Beef and Cabbage with our favorite beverage. It was delicious!

data.title: Amazing Nostalgic Bar
data.text: I cannot say enough great things about this bar; it was exactly as I had hoped after reading about it online.  Very old school.  The Bartender, Gary was amazing making great cocktails.  The atmosphere was beyond friendly and they have terrific food at even more terrific prices.  Not typical bar food for sure -  We meant to stop in for just a couple before dinner and we ended up staying for most of the evening and eating dinner here.  Glad we did; this place has it all.  Also nice area with bags and pinball in a separate section.  Any trip back to Davenport will include a trip to this Pub!   Great music playing, great food, great service and full of great people.

data.title: Fun downtown bar.
data.text: Great tacos for a downtown bar.  Beyond that choose a martini from the martini menu.  Nice during the week, busy on the weekends.

data.title: A Hole in the Wall of the best kind
data.text: Hit this place around 5 on a Saturday night. They had some really great happy hour drink specials.  $2 wells, $3 beer.  I had 2 rum & coke and then ordered a hamburger with a side salad.  When I got my bill, the total was only $7.55.  Apparently the burger was a happy hour special too.  Can't beat that!  Check this place it, it's worth it.

data.title: Best place to grab a martini in town!!
data.text:
The Staff is Awesome, the Martinis are Strong, & the food is Fantastic! 

You can't go wrong when going to Mac's Tavern, whether it be for a bite to eat or a night out for some drinks!! 

If you want to avoid the larger crowds you should go earlier in the night or avoid weekend nights.

data.title: Fun place with some suprisingly great Food
data.text: We stopped at Mac's last night on a whim to grab a drink.  Decided to order an appetizer and went with the Chicken Quesadilla.  My wife and I agreed that it was the best Quesadilla we had ever had.  Amazing flavor.  Staff was very attentive and we enjoyed the atmosphere of the vintage Tavern.   We will be going back soon!

data.title: Tasty!
data.text: My fiance and I went on Tuesday for $1.50 taco night. We had never been and were unsure of portions - we ordered nachos, 3 tacos and 24 wings .... it was a great size feast! The prices are very reasonable - the wings were my favorite part! Parm Garlic and Honey Garlic!
